title.en: There is - Negative & Questions (Hay negativo e interrogativo)
title.es: There is - Negative & Questions (Hay negativo e interrogativo)

description.en: Learn negative forms 'there isn't' and 'there's not', plus question formation with 'Is there...?'. Spanish speakers often struggle with English negative contractions and subject-verb inversion in questions.
description.es: Aprende las formas negativas 'there isn't' y 'there's not', además de la formación de preguntas con 'Is there...?'. Los hispanohablantes a menudo luchan con las contracciones negativas del inglés y la inversión sujeto-verbo en preguntas.

prompt.es: ¡No hay nada para leer en esta casa!

exercises.solution: There isn't anything to read in this house!

tip.en: Use 'there isn't' or 'there's not' for negative. Both are common.
tip.es: Usa 'there isn't' o 'there's not' para negativo. Ambas son comunes.
